column6: "LIVING PLANET" PART 2 (OF 2) Ego the Living Planet  -  a father?! It's up to the Exiles, the Avengers, and the Fantastic Four to keep the Earth from becoming Ego Junior!
column8: | writer:Tony Bedard | penciller:James Calafiore | colorist:Jung Choi | inker:Mark McKenna | penciller (cover):Mizuki Sakakibara | letterer:Dave Sharpe
